name: Tripeaks (itch)
description:
A simple tripeaks solitaire implemented using c++ and sdl2

Controls:

  • Click on the current card to undo
  • Click on the button to draw card

Note:

  • The game's probably not balanced as cards generated are totally random (a normal game of tripeaks only uses 1 deck of card this one disregards that)

the assets are from yaomon's pixel playing-cards except for the back of the card and the button
